Class DirectionalLight

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.Element

              edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.Light
                  edu.cmu.cs.stage3.alice.scenegraph.DirectionalLight

public class DirectionalLight
extends Light

a directional light emits parallel rays (as if it were at infinity).
the direction is inherent from absolute transformation of its container.
useful in simulating sunlight.

Author:
Dennis Cosgrove
